test-case.name: User has an option to enroll for AutoPay
test-case.title: User has an option to enroll for AutoPay

step.name: user is not enrolled for AutoPay
step.title: user is not enrolled for AutoPay

step.name: user enrolls for AutoPay and gets "You successfully enrolled in Auto Pay! You will receive a confirmation email shortly."
step.title: user enrolls for AutoPay and gets "You successfully enrolled in Auto Pay! You will receive a confirmation email shortly."

step.name: user closes success message dialog and AutoPay card is not displayed in Dashboard
step.title: user closes success message dialog and AutoPay card is not displayed in Dashboard

failure.message: unknown error: Cannot read property 'scrollTo' of null
failure.stack-trace: Error: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. at execute(<Function>) - index.js:316:3

test-case.name: User has an option to Update AutoPay information
test-case.title: User has an option to Update AutoPay information

step.name: user is enrolled for AutoPay to update information
step.title: user is enrolled for AutoPay to update information

step.name: user updates AutoPay enrollment and gets the message "You successfully enrolled in Auto Pay! You will receive a confirmation email shortly."
step.title: user updates AutoPay enrollment and gets the message "You successfully enrolled in Auto Pay! You will receive a confirmation email shortly."

step.name: user closes success message dialog and AutoPay card is displayed with updated Information
step.title: user closes success message dialog and AutoPay card is displayed with updated Information

failure.message: no such window: target window already closed from unknown error: web view not found
failure.stack-trace: Error: A request to switch to a different window could not be satisfied because the window could not be found. at element(".amw-bill-payment-close-icon") - index.js:316:3

test-case.name: User has an option to Cancel AutoPay Enrollment
test-case.title: User has an option to Cancel AutoPay Enrollment

step.name: user cancels AutoPay enrollment and gets the message "You successfully cancelled enrollment in Auto Pay."
step.title: user cancels AutoPay enrollment and gets the message "You successfully cancelled enrollment in Auto Pay."

step.name: user closes success message dialog and AutoPay card is now displayed in Dashboard
step.title: user closes success message dialog and AutoPay card is now displayed in Dashboard

failure.message: no such window: target window already closed from unknown error: web view not found
